entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
